website_summaries.verdict: This compact, easy-to-use Alexa-friendly smart plug is sure to serve you well and consistently.
pros: Integrates with Alexa using a 2.4 GHz WiFi network to allow you to access all of your devices
Free Jinvoo smart app enables you to seamlessly control your gadgets
Doesn't have any hidden monthly fees and doesn't require a hub
Backed by a risk-free satisfaction guarantee
cons: May disconnect from WiFi at times

customer_reviews.title: mini plugs are a must!
customer_reviews.text: I'm so glad I finally bought a mini wifi plug. I currently have 3 traditional wifi plugs, which also means I have 3 unused sockets because the big plugs are in the way. I saw the mini for a good price and decided to replace one of the traditional ones, and I'm glad I did. I now have a free plug for my phone charger, or whatever. Set up was literally less than a minute with the app, and it works effortlessly with Alexa. I will probably get rid of the other plugs and purchase more mini ones soon.
customer_reviews.author: LBG

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't connect
customer_reviews.text: I don't understand why all the reviews are so high on this item, maybe they're all android users? I have an iPhone and this device doesn't connect to the apps that you're supposed to download for it. I've tried switching outlets and moving things closer but for some reason it doesn't connect. I know the outlets are working because I can see the blinking light on the device. I probably will end up returning this item. Now I wish I hadn't tried to save money and should've just spent the extra money to get a quality device.
customer_reviews.author: Nicky

customer_reviews.title: Worked for awhile and then stopped
customer_reviews.text: This little smart plug is a wonderful thing to have when you don’t have a smart tv yet! It’s so nice to have an Amazon Echo to control with your voice but you weren’t able to control the tv with your voice. Now I can! It’s so nice to know when you’re laying in bed and you realize that your children have run off with your remote that you can just say “Alexa, turn off the tv” and you don’t have to worry about getting out of your cozy bed! AMAZING!!!! *** Update to add - stopped allowing me to turn off my tv with my remotes. Had to unplug and have not used again.
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: Works only if you use on outlet but not good if using on outlet strip
customer_reviews.text: Had to return this product because when plugged into my outlet strip it blocked other outlets so other plugs can't be used at the same time. Also the blue light on the side is very bright. Bought a Teckin mini smart outlet that's a 2 pk and its round so fits great and is smaller and allows for other items to be plugged in at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: S. Leong

customer_reviews.title: Smarter Home on a budget
customer_reviews.text: Take your Alexa to the next level. Pros: The compact design is awesome, it takes up only one slot The app and integration with Alexa was easy enough It has a manual button in the side in case you want to turn on something without the app or Alexa Cons: Have not figured out if I can get this to work with Siri or the Google home but then again have not put that much time into this. Overall: Buy this to start making your home smarter, it's a low investment as opposed to Hue bulbs and bridges for lights, a new coffee maker or where ever you might end up using this.
customer_reviews.author: ASANA

customer_reviews.title: Smart Plug with Sleek Design
customer_reviews.text: This Smart plug outlet works great and is pretty easy to set up. I have it controlling my christmas tree using Alexa so I can just tell her to turn it on and off. Works like a charm. You could also just download the free app and control it from your phone if you don't have Alexa. In addition to controlling the on/off, this also works on a timer you can set for auto shut off. The shape of this smart plug is sleek and does not take up the whole outlet like others I've had. it's narrow and horizontal so there is still plenty of room to use the other plug. In fact you could add another smart plug!
customer_reviews.author: Tommy + Mich

customer_reviews.title: dependable
customer_reviews.text: it is fairly easy to set up after you establish the app on your phone via a QR code scan turn on the plug with a small side switch and it blinks indicating ready to pair. the phone app will search for it and pair almost effortlessly. there is a choice to do off-on and timer for either, as well as a daily repeat if desired also it's small so will fit in the wall socket and not take up both sides
customer_reviews.author: Michael Burke

customer_reviews.title: WILL repurchase!
customer_reviews.text: This works PERFECTLY. It connected quickly to our Amazon echo dot 2 through the app. We have decided to use if for our living room lamps. We ran an extension cord so that we could plug in three lamps to this one plug and it's flawless. This is a much better value than some other smart plugs and does exactly what we need it to. Will definitely purchase more!
customer_reviews.author: Jo CatherineTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Works PERFECTLY with Alexa! Easy set up, too! 10 Stars, quick delivery!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 4 of these just before Christmas to see if they would work with my Christmas trees etc. They worked PERFECTLY for our trees and with Alexa!! We LOVE these and I just recently purchased another one. We are now using these for our table lamps throughout. I highly recommend! Easy set up, as well!! I'd give 10 Stars if I could
customer_reviews.author: OstensiblyCilla

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product pros Small Fits well in the outlet doesn't wiggle Has a button to manually turn it on/off Easy to set up Easy to use App has great UI(user interface or appearance) Little blue light isn't too bright or too dim Doesn't block the other outlet Cons Google home? Could've been smalller
customer_reviews.author: Daniel E

customer_reviews.title: spotty operation
customer_reviews.text: this device was recently installed by professional. He could not make it work . It's performance was on/off, mostly off. Too late to return. Wish we had installed earlier. Buy one of the other brands
customer_reviews.author: hask k.

customer_reviews.title: Reliable with Alexa, easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: Easy setup on the Android app and then easy setup with Alexa. Been using it for a month and works every time I give a voice command through Alexa ("Alexa, turn off bedroom"). Only takes up one plug space on the outlet! I've tried some other smart plugs over the years -- this is the best all around so far. I'm about to order another.
customer_reviews.author: Tim G

customer_reviews.title: Missing troubleshooting capability
customer_reviews.text: My area has too many APs that the 2.4G WiFi is lousy. My daily losing connectivity is not the fault of the device so 4 stars. (other brands do the same) 1. The app/plug does not contain any debugging to see why the device stopped working. A past history log would be helpful to see what channel the plug thinks it is on, if it received a disconnect command, interference received, etc. so the problem can be troubleshot. 2. When my AP automatically switches channels due to interference the plug does not move to the new channel. I either need to reset the plug or my AP to recover.
customer_reviews.author: Eric T

customer_reviews.title: I'm very happy with my smart plug
customer_reviews.text: 'set up couldn't have been very easier',It was a very quick couple steps out of the box to functioning correctly,I was able to name the plug for whatever I wanted and the app works pretty well.I did hook it up to my google home just for ease of keeping everything together,It works very quickly when switched through the app and does exactly like its supposed to,my only'complaint'or criticism is that when toggled on /off,it makes a click noisy that seems a little loud,not loud enough to disrupt anything,but just enough to grab your attention. overall,it's great and does exactly what it's supposed to'
customer_reviews.author: Marc Skerritt

customer_reviews.title: Great price, integrates with Alexa seamlessly!
customer_reviews.text: Very good price range. Integrated this with Alexa pretty seamlessly. Took about ~10m to set up the whole thing. I had a corner lamp that was a pain in the butt to get to. Now I just tell Alexa to turn it off/on :). Feels like living in the future. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: The Guy Who Bought This

customer_reviews.title: Smart amazing device
customer_reviews.text: It works well with alexa. At first we have trouble setting it up only to find out we have some problem with our internet router. So we tried again the following day and now it works very well with our side lamp.
customer_reviews.author: Karlheinz

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! I plan to get another one! Easy to use and set up! It's a great size, not to bulky. Doesn't block your second electrical socket! I use mine with Alexa and haven't had any problems! Great buy! Good quality!
customer_reviews.author: Crazychick96

customer_reviews.title: Randomly turn my floor lamp on and off at night to simulate someone is home to deter the bad guys
customer_reviews.text: Had a floor lamp connected to it when i'm away from home. randomly turn it on and off at night to simulate someone is home to deter the bad guys. Works pretty well. Even though it has one plug, I plugged an extension cord to it and power up multiple devices. At the same time, bear in mind that all devices will be on or off as a group simultaneously.
customer_reviews.author: OneLove

customer_reviews.title: Incomplete Package shipped.
customer_reviews.text: Bought the two pack. Received one. No instructions on how to connect with Google Home.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased.
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this device. Was pretty straightforward getting it to work with my Amazon Echo. Really convenient for turning on and off a hard to reach lamp.
customer_reviews.author: Gronne

customer_reviews.title: extremely straightforward and just works. We used it to ...
customer_reviews.text: extremely straightforward and just works. We used it to control our christmas tree lights instead of having to crawl behind it we just told alexa to do it. Doesnt seem to work with google home
customer_reviews.author: Eric White

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and cheap!
customer_reviews.text: Inexpensive. Easy to use. Easy to program. Works with Alexa.
customer_reviews.author: kenoarto

customer_reviews.title: Works great with Alexa
customer_reviews.text: Works great with Alexa. I have it plugged into my bedroom TV. If I leave the TV on when I disable the outlet, the TV will turn back on when enabled.
customer_reviews.author: Michael E. Olson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Cheap and easy to set up. Use it on a lamp to schedule on and off times.
customer_reviews.author: geohil

customer_reviews.title: This product is awesome. The design is great in the fact that ...
customer_reviews.text: This product is awesome. The design is great in the fact that it is not bulky and allows clearance for other plugs. The app is super easy to use as well.
customer_reviews.author: Richard B.

customer_reviews.title: Smart Plug
customer_reviews.text: Works well for me. I use it with google home.
customer_reviews.author: Nem

customer_reviews.title: It's very easy to us
customer_reviews.text: Received the smart plug recently and it is a solid technology piece that looks sharp as well. It's very easy to use and I recommend trying it out.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Zawisky

customer_reviews.title: Gift!
customer_reviews.text: I love this item! I use it with my Christmas lights! I love to have control over when they come on and when they go off!
customer_reviews.author: Angie A Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Google doesn’t work on it
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t work for google assistance, on the add it says it’s compatible buts it’s not
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, compact quick and easy. Allows you to use your 2nd outlet
customer_reviews.author: Gary S

customer_reviews.title: No warranty
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working after 4 months and they wont warranty anything. Still connected to wifi but wont turn on any devices
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: my sister got it!.She loves it. This is totally new to her. She's tried it several times and she is very impressed with the item.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Davis

customer_reviews.title: Helpful !
customer_reviews.text: Very good WiFi plug in good price ! Easy to set up and easy to use! Very helpful and useful!
customer_reviews.author: KIM LAU

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes it has lost connection to my wifi. A quick reset and it works again.
customer_reviews.author: Ivan G.

customer_reviews.title: Others work great which is why they are still receiving three starts
customer_reviews.text: Ordered three of these, one has stopped working after about 2-3 weeks of use. Others work great which is why they are still receiving three starts. Review will change pertinent to their response on this matter.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: easy to install and use
customer_reviews.text: It's easy to install and use,I don't need to be out of my bed to check if the lights are off at night,I love the smart plug!
customer_reviews.author: Vallarie Jeter

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love it!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this plug very skeptical because almost all smart plugs are ridiculously big and once you plug it in you cannot plus anything else into the wall. But this little thing gave me room so I can plug something else into the wall. With quick and easy set up I was able to control my lights from my phone. This little plug is so cute and Small you don’t have to worry about a huge eye sore where a wall outlet once was
customer_reviews.author: Jinell Shamay

customer_reviews.title: I recently started to convert our home into Smart home using Alexa and Google
customer_reviews.text: I recently started to convert our home into Smart home using Alexa and Google. This plug was way too easy to install. You just need to install the application, rapidly blinking light, press search and you are done. It supports both Alexa and google. I have been using this for television and other lights using multi switch plug and it works like a charm.
customer_reviews.author: Gulati

customer_reviews.title: great buy!
customer_reviews.text: the design on this is really smart; being sideways, it doesnt block the other outlet. works as it should and is way cheaper than the other brands
customer_reviews.author: NYC4Lyfe

customer_reviews.title: works very well
customer_reviews.text: This works very well with my Google home unit as well as Amazon echo unit. I am happy that it is UL listed so I know that it is safe to use in my home.
customer_reviews.author: Donna K Cipressi

customer_reviews.title: This is a great device
customer_reviews.text: wifi socket - This is a great device! If you have an amazon Alexa or Echo, you will definitely benefit from one of these wifi sockets. I love that you can plug it in and still use the other socket. It is very simple to download the app and then you have a lot of flexibility for managing your devices including your TV, lighting, and more. You can label your devices in the app, making it easy to manage which ones you would like to turn off and on. Convenient and fun!
customer_reviews.author: Fatima Mghizou

product_meta.title: Wi-Fi Smart Plug, Mini Outlet HOMEMAXS Socket Compatible with Amazon Alexa and Google Home Assistant IFTTT, No Hub Required, Compact and Easy To Use
product_meta.description:
Style:1 Pack

The Easy Way to Control Your Devices Remotely
HOMEMAXS Smart Plugs are designed to use your outlets at home so that you can control any device from anywhere in the world using Wi-Fi access. 
Our Smart Plugs integrate seamlessly with Alexa and Echo Dot for voice control. 

Easy set up and no hidden fees!
No hub required and the Jinvoo Smart App is free to download to your smartphone or mobile device.

Our Smart Plugs come in a convenient mini size so that you keep your home free from clutter. Plugs can piggyback on top of each other so that 
you only use one outlet.

Don’t worry about devices being left on after you leave your home.
It’s the easy way to use smart technology in your home.
Order now by clicking “Add to Cart” and set up your devices quickly the moment you receive our Smart Plugs.
Buy with confidence when you purchase from HOMEMAXS. We offer world-class customer support to answer any questions for you.

Product Specifications
Power Input: 10A, 100-240V
Power Output: 10A, 100-240V
Max Power: 1800W
Shell Material: Retardant ABS
Wireless Standard: 802.11.b/g/n
Wireless type: Wi-Fi 2.4GHz
Security Mechanism: WEP/WPA-PSK/WPA2-PSK/WPA/WPA2/WAPS/WPS2
Working Humidity: <80%

Package Including
1 x HOMEMAXS Mini Smart Plug, Wi-Fi Plugs 
1 x User Manual
feature_bullets: ★ CONTROL YOUR DEVICES EASILY: The HOMEMAXS Smart Plug integrates with Alexa using a 2.4GHz Wi-Fi network to allow you access to all of your devices.
★ NO HIDDEN COSTS: This Smart Plug doesn’t have any hidden monthly fees or required hub.
★ COMPACT DESIGN FOR CLEANER HOMES: No need to worry about clutter from extra cords. These mini smart plugs can be stacked on top to use the same outlet. Use your Wi-Fi!

★ CONVENIENT REMOTE CONTROL: Easily control your lights and appliances connected to the Smart Plugs by using the free Jinvoo Smart App. Wi-Fi access lets you control your devices from anywhere in the world!
★ SAFE TO USE: HOMEMAXS Smart Plug is approved for safety and quality assurance. We offer 100% Risk Free Satisfaction and a 1 year refund with every purchase.
